text: jo tame sara karmo karya to te tamara potana ja phayada mate che ane jo tame khotam karmo karya to te pana tamara potana mate ja che. Phari jyare bija vacanano samaya avyo, (to ame bija banda'one mokali didha jethi) te tamara cahera bagadi nakhe ane prathama vakhatani jemaja te ja masjidamam ghusi jaya ane je je vastu hatha lage tene todi phodi nakhe
